data.name: InfoCommandsText
data.value: If you wish to perform something check the following commands: - 'a' is for adding. - 'r' is for read. - 'm' is for modifying something. - 'b' is for borrowing books. - 'q' is for quit from the program. - 'esc' is for going up one menu level.

data.name: BookNumberText
data.value: The number of the book in the library is: {0}

data.name: UserNumberText
data.value: The number of the users logged in to the library is: {0}

data.name: WhatToAdd
data.value: What do you want to add?

data.name: WhatToRead
data.value: What do you want to read?

data.name: HowToModify
data.value: How to you want to modify? If you wish to perform something check the following commands: - 'd' is for delete something.

data.name: InfoCommandsAddText
data.value: If you wish to perform something check the following commands: - 'u' is for users. - 'b' is for books.

data.name: BookToReturn
data.value: Which book would you want to return? Please enter in it's ID:

data.name: BookToBorrow
data.value: Which book would you want to borrow? Please enter in it's ID:

data.name: WhoIsBorrowing
data.value: Who is borrowing the book? Please enter in his/her ID:

data.name: WhoIsReturning
data.value: Who is returning the book? Please enter in his/her ID:

data.name: InfoWrongInputValue
data.value: Incorrect value, please enter in some number:

data.name: InfoWantToReturnOrBorrow
data.value: What do you want? Return a book or borrow a book? - 'b' when borrow a book. - 'r' when return a book.

data.name: InfoUnderDevelopement
data.value: This feature is still under development!

data.name: ErrorUserFileNotFound
data.value: There is no file for users or books yet. Add some!

data.name: ErrorBookFileNotFound
data.value: There is no file for users or books yet. Add some!

data.name: LanguageSwitch
data.value: Choose a language for the test: - 'h' is for hungarian. - 'e' is for english. - 'j' is for japanese.
